name: 王聖銘
objective: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
schedule:
Unit 1: Principles and Process（第一單元：原理與步驟）
Introduction to UX（使用者經驗概論）
	Describe the field of UX and how it relates to other disciplines
	Outline the stages in the UX process
	Identify the structure and purpose of various design deliverables
User Research and Personas（使用者研究與人物誌整理）
	Write a questionnaire
	Interview users in context
	Identify User Centered Design techniques
	Create effective personas to define the users one is trying to reach
UX Analysis（使用者經驗分析）
	Ask questions that discover key business needs
	Describe the benefits to an MVP approach
	Given a goal, identify the tasks for a user to complete that goal and draw the user flow
	Given a problem and a determined feature set, use a competitive audit to determine if there are different ways to implement the feature
	Prioritize features based on essentialness and level of effort
Unit 2: UX Toolkit and Measurement（第二單元：使用者經驗分析與量測工具）
Creating Wireframes and Prototypes（架構與雛型的建構）
	Identify and describe tools for wireframing, prototyping, advanced drawing, and creating clickable drawings
	Create wireframes, clickable drawings, and prototypes
Usability Principles and Testing（易用性評估原理與測試）
	Evaluate user experience of given websites and products, using Jakob Nielsen's 5 Principles of Usability（易用性的五大原則）
	Define each type of usability test and determine when to use each
	Run a usability test using best practices
User Experience Measurement（使用者竟驗量測）
	Measuring user experience by participant observation
	Eye tracking basic, applications and implementation on user experience analysis
	Using Electroencephalography (EEG) in a usability test of a survey
	Scientific data analysis and big data analysis
Unit 3: Practices for Design Patterns（第三單元：設計實務）註：依修課學生之領域選擇
Product Service System User Survey（產品設計系統使用者調查）
Service Design of Interaction Technology（互動技術之服務設計）
Social Network Experiences Design and Evaluation（社群網絡之經驗設計與評估）
